alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Lafourche; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST...SOUTHEASTERN ST. JAMES...WEST CENTRAL ST. CHARLES...NORTHEASTERN TERREBONNE...NORTHWESTERN LAFOURCHE AND EAST CENTRAL ASSUMPTION PARISHES... At 546 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Schriever, or 7 miles southwest of Thibodaux, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Thibodaux, Mathews, Schriever, Gray, Des Allemands, Raceland, South Vacherie, Chackbay, Labadieville, Bayou Cane, Bayou Gauche and Supreme. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Lafourche; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Terrebonne
